La A.C. “GARDENIAS” iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora María es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de polleras y mantas, venta de api, venta de comida, costura de faldas, venta de queso, venta de carne de cordero, costura de pantalones.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora María es integrante, ella indica que hace cuatro ciclos que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de condimentos; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años al contar con un capital pequeño decide implementarlo en la compra de estos productos.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de condimentos por mayor) que adquirirá en las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros que le ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Gardenias” is starting its fifth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the German Busch Community Center. This group consists of eight members and is led by a Board of Directors in which Sra. María serves as the president. The members of this Communal Bank engage in different businesses such as selling skirts and blankets, selling “api” (a beverage made from corn), selling food, producing skirts, selling cheese, selling lamb meat, and producing trousers.

This loan will benefit small businesswomen such as Sra. María. She says that she has participated in four loan cycles since joining Pro Mujer. María received an invitation from a friend who is also a member of the organization. At the moment, she manages a business of selling condiments. She gained knowledge of this business since she started it several years ago with a small amount of capital. María decided to start this business so that she could sell these products.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her capital for buying condiments in bulk. She acquires these products from the wholesale vendors in the city of El Alto and then sells them from her retail space. Working in this manner enables her to generate income for sustaining her family. María is in a common-law relationship and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, María said that she enjoys the savings accounts that are offered by the organization.

loans.use: to buy condiments in bulk.

loans.name: Nazrullo

texts.en: Nazrullo is 34 years old. He is a smart and responsible man. Nazrullo is married and has 3 children. His wife is a housewife and his children are still young. Nazrullo’s parents live with him. He is the main earner of his big family. Nazrullo has been doing animal husbandry for more than 10 years. He has a cowshed in his house. His experience and skills help him to develop his business. Nazrullo feeds cows and sells his cows in a local market. Thanks to his hard labor he has regular customers. He is going to increase the number of his cows he sells. He is asking for a loan of 12,000 Somoni to buy cows for increasing working capital. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cows for increasing working capital

loans.name: Kyanya Bakyara Thuwathikana Gp Group

texts.en: Eddy is a fifty year old married woman living in Kasese, Uganda. She has five children; all of whom go to school. She has dealt in retail business for fourteen years. She ventured into this business in order to cater for her family to meet the increasing demands in our economy. Eddy hopes to become a strong business woman even though her customers don't pay her on time. She needs the loan to buy sugar and soap to sell. Eddy is a member of Kyanya Bakyara Thuwathikana group where each member guarantees the other to get a loan since they cannot afford security.

loans.use: to buy sugar and soap to sell.

loans.name: Jameela

texts.en:
Jameela is a 41-year-old woman who is a maid by profession. Basically, she belongs to a poor family. She has six children and her husband is a hawker by profession. He sells different types of fruits from a cart. Both husband and wife contribute their income to manage the household and fulfill the children's educational needs and other needs.

Jameela's husband wants to purchase different kinds of fruits such as bananas, apples, and grapes to sell, but due to financial constraints, he is unable to purchase these fruits for his business. Therefore, Jameela has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, she'll provide assistance to her husband to buy fruit for his business. 

Jameela is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy fruits to resell

loans.name: Shoira

texts.ru:
Шоира позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Шоира мечтала стать учительницей, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Шоиру выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Но даже находясь постоянно  дома, Шоира никогда не сидит без дела. Она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.

Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Шоира вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Шоира выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Шоира получает хороший доход. Муж Шоиры также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Шоира с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Шоира заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, в следствие которой улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Shoira is a positive and hardworking woman.  She is married and has two children.  She lives in a small rural village.  Shoira had dreamed of being a teacher since childhood, but her circumstances were such that she was not able to receive a college education because of financial need in the family.  Right after high school graduation Shoira was married off.  She became a housewife.  Even though she is always at home Shoira never sits still.  She and her husband try to do everything possible to provide their children with all necessities.

In order to have a steady income to feed their family Shoira and her husband started their own business.  They raise livestock.  Shoira raises livestock and then sells the meat and milk.  Shoira earns a good income from this business.  Shoira's husband works at a local workshop and his job brings additional earnings to the family.  Their combined income is enough for a middle class life.  For now they do not have enough resources in order to cover all of their needs.  At the moment Shoira and her husband would like to buy several more heads of livestock to raise.  This is why she turned to Arvand and would like to take out a loan to purchase livestock.  Shoira thanks Arvand in advance for the support, as a result of which  her family's life will improve.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Luís Enrique

texts.es:
Luis tiene 39 años de edad, solamente estudió hasta cuarto grado ya que sus padres no le pudieron dar estudio, por la situacion de pobreza en que vivian, ahora está acompañado y tiene 2 hijos que actualmente estudian primaria en la escuela de la comunidad.

La agricultura, ha sido la actividad a la cual Luis se ha dedicado desde hace 25 años, siembra hortalizas y cuida de ganado de repasto, este trabajo lo aprendió desde muy joven, ya que sus padres lo emplearon en estas labores desde que era muy pequeño, actualmente son sus únicas fuentes de ingreso para sobrevivir con su familia. 
Para llegar hasta su parcela, tiene que caminar una hora y media por lomas y caminos muy empinados, ya que esta se encuentra  entre un cerro, luego de terminar su jornada de trabajo, regresa a casa y camina otra hora y media. 

Luis solicita $1,100.00,  a CREDICAMPO, para comprar 3 novillos de repasto, ya que con esto podrá obtener alguna ganancia después de cierto tiempo, pues necesita seguir dando el sustento diario a su familia.

Él planea trabajar muy duro, para ayudar a sus hijos y lograr que estos sean grandes profesionales y personas de bien, y que además tengan una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Luis, 39, studied only until fourth grade because his parents couldn’t afford to send him to school due to their economic situation. Now he has a partner and two children who attend primary school in the community.

Luis has worked in agriculture for 25 years cultivating vegetables and raising cattle, work he learned when he was very young as his parents had him working since he was very little. Now these activites are his only source of income for his family. 

To arrive to his plot, he has to walk an hour and a half through hills and very steep roads, as it’s located between hills. After finishing his workday, he walks another hour and a half to return home. 

Luis is requesting $1,100.00 from CrediCampo to purchase 3 calves to put to pasture so he can obtain some earnings after a certain time because he needs to continue providing for his family.

He plans to work very hard to help his children so that they can be great professionals, good people and have better lives.

loans.use: to purchase 3 calves to put to pasture.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Being a mother, Jesusa does everything that she can to help her husband earn additional income. She makes sure that she can keep her children in their school. She wishes to see her kids finish their studies. 

Due to insufficient capital to run her business, Jesusa is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP to buy feed and vitamins for her hog-raising business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her hog-raising business.

loans.name: Victor Adonay

texts.es:
Adonay tiene 38 años de edad, se graduo de bachiller, pero la situacion economica de sus padres no le permitio continuar sus estudios universitarios, está acompañado y tiene 3 hijos  de 1, 9 y 15 años de edad, ellos estudian en la escuelita del canton.

Adonay tiene 25 años de experiencia en trabajar con ganado y cultivos de maiz, frijol y maicillo, ya que desde joven ha trabajado en dichas actividades, actualmente esta es su unica fuente de ingresos, para mantener a su familia. 
Para hacer su trabajo, tiene que caminar todos los días 3 kilometros a pie,  hasta llegar a su parcela, la cual esta ubicada en las faldas de un cerro, y para llevar los insumos tiene que cargarlos en un caballo.

Este hombre trabajador, solicita $ 700.00  CrediCampo, para comprar una yunta de novillos, para engordarlos en repasto y venderlos cuando ya tengan un buen precio, esto ayudara a ganar dinero para la comida y el estudio de sus hijos.

Él tiene muchos planes a futuro, está planificando trabajar muy duro y ahorrar, para construir su propia casa y que sus hijos puedan vivir en un lugar mejor.
texts.en:
Adonay is 38 years old. He graduated from high school, but the economic situation of his parents did not allow him to continue his university studies. He has a common law spouse and three children. They are 1, 9 and 15 years old and study in the little school on the corner. 

Adonay has 25 years of experience in working with livestock and farming corn, beans and grain, because since he was young he has done this work. Currently this is his only source of income to support his family. In order to do his work, every day he has to walk 3 kilometers on foot until he arrives at his plot, which is located on the slopes of a hill. To bring his supplies he has to carry them on a horse.

This hardworking man is requesting $700 from CrediCampo in order to buy a pair of heifers, to fatten them by grazing and to sell them when they can fetch a good price. This will help him to earn money for food and his children's studies.

Adonay has many plans for the future. He is planning to work very hard and save in order to build his own house and so his children can live in a better place.

loans.use: to buy a pair of heifers.

loans.name: Lizeth

texts.es: La señora Lizeth de 25 años de edad, es soltera, vive al oeste de la ciudad de Cochabamba, tienen un grado de instrucción de nivel bachillerato, no tiene hijos dependientes de sus ingresos, desde muy joven empezó a trabajar para pagar sus estudios y salir adelante de forma independiente. Su principal actividad  es el servicio de Tapicería y tiene 3 años de experiencia, trabaja en un taller de tapicería donde tiene una antigüedad de 1 año, cumple con la funciones de creación de nuevos modelos y comercialización de muebles tapizados de todo tipo. También se dedica a realizar trabajos pequeños a cuenta propia, como cojines y butacas las mismas que las elabora y refacciona, el presente crédito es para comprar materia prima como telas de toda variedad, esponjas y demás insumos para tapicería, de esta forma generara ingresos extras, y así podrá salir adelante y cumplir sus metas trazadas.
texts.en: Lizeth is 25 years old, is single, and lives in the Eastern part of the city of Cochabamba. She has completed high school, and she does not have any children dependent on her income. From a very young age, she began working to pay for her education and to go forward independently. Her main occupation is upholstery, and she has three years of experience in this. She works in an upholstery workshop, where she has worked for one year. She is responsible for creating new models and for selling upholstered furniture of all types. She also does small upholstery jobs on her own, including cushions and armchairs, which she also makes and repairs. This loan is to buy raw materials, such as all kinds of fabric, foam, and other supplies for upholstery. In this way, she will earn more income and, thus, will be able to go forward and achieve her desired goals.

loans.use: to buy raw materials, such as all kinds of fabric, foam, and other supplies for upholstery.

loans.name: Afihat

texts.en:
Afihat is a 46-year-old woman and a teacher by profession. She is the mother of one son and two daughters. Her husband is a mechanic by profession and he is responsible to fulfill his family's needs. Afihat has also been running her own academy for one year. She provides education services to the children and contributes her income to her husband's to manage her household.

Afihat needs some furniture (e.g chairs, stools, tables) and wants to make some renovations to her place of business, but due some financial constraints she is not in a position to incur these expenditures. Therefore, Afihat has applied for a Kiva loan from Kiva field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can purchase the above items relevant to her business.

Afihat is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for providing this loan opportunity.

loans.use: to buy furniture and make renovations to her academy business.

loans.name: Kalys

texts.ru: Калыс 31 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Калыс - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Калыс занимается животноводством, стартовав 12 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Калыс, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы с теленком, 2 кобылы и 1 лошадь. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Калыс обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Калыс планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство дома.
texts.en: Kalys is 31 years old, she is married and raises 3 children with her husband.  Kalys has a high school education and as a main source of income for her family Kalys raises livestock, having started 12 years ago with a purchase of 10,000 som KGS.  Thanks to Kalys' hard work her household currently has: 3 dairy cows with calfs, 2 mares and 1 horse.  Her monthly income is 11,000 som (KGS).  In order to further expand her holdings Kalys turned to Bank "Bai Tushum," for a loan for the purchase of a cow in order to increase her livestock holdings.  Kalys plans to invest her earnings from the loan into further increasing her livestock count and plans to save money to build a house.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Freddy Ariel

texts.es: Freddy es originario de la ciudad de Diriomo, casado y padre de dos hijos. Tiene 28 años de edad. Es de oficio artesano, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de camas de madera. Inicio su negocio con la experiencia que obtuvo cuando trabajo con su papa y poco a poco fue instalando su propio negocio, hoy en día cuenta con un negocio próspero y una amplia clientela. Su meta próxima es ampliar su negocio. Solicita el crédito para comprar madera. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Su plan futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su casa y con sus ventas obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Freddy is originally from the city of Diriomo, is married, and is the father of two children. He is 28 years old. He is an artisan, dedicated to making and selling wooden beds. He started his business based on the experience he gained when he worked with his father, and little by little, he set up his own business. Today, he has a successful business and a large clientele. His next goal is to grow his business. He requests this loan to buy wood. He believes that the loan will help him a great deal in satisfying his clients’ demands. His future plan is to improve his home’s infrastructure and, with his sales, to gain more earnings.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Odai

texts.en:
Odai is 28 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with his four sisters and his parents. His father is retired. 

Odai is a university student majoring in Plant Production. He is in his second year, and is planning to find a better job after graduation to earn better income in order to support his family. To reach his goal, he is seeking a loan to pay for his upcoming semester fees since he does not have enough money to do so.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Roberto Arturo

texts.es:
Roberto tiene 30 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañado, su esposa se encarga de los oficios del hogar y está sacando los estudios de bachillerato los días sábados, tienen un hijo quien también se encuentra estudiando.

Roberto es una persona trabajadora que se dedica a muchas actividades productivas, la primera es la producción de una hectárea de maíz y la segunda es compra y venta de ganado. Estas actividades las aprendió de su padre quien ha sido agricultor toda su vida y a quien le gustaba trabajar en engorde de ganado de repasto. Por esta razón el señor  Roberto decidió dedicarse a estas actividades, ya que son el resultado de la dedicación que su padre puso, para que su hijo lograra ser una persona honesta y trabajadora.

El préstamo que Roberto está solicitando, lo necesita para continuar con el negocio de compra y venta de ganado, ya que es una de las formas con la cual obtiene  ingresos económicos para mantener a su familia y para los gastos del hogar, y no quisiera que su trabajo se viera estancado por no tener los recursos suficientes.

Su trabajo con el ganado, es una de las cosas que mas le apasionan a Roberto, es por eso que él sueña con tener vacas lecheras, así lograra involucrarse de lleno en la ganadería. Él desea esforzarse y trabajar mucho pues reconoce que es una actividad que requiere de mucha inversión, y con los reultados de su trabajo también desea darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto is 30 years old and studied up to the ninth grade. He is in a relationship; his wife is in charge of domestic tasks and is studying for her high school degree on Saturdays. They have a son who is also studying.

Roberto is a hard-working person who makes a living from many productive business. The first is the production of a hectare of corn, and the second is buying and selling cattle. He learned these business from his father, who has been a farmer for his entire life and who likes to work to fatten pastured cattle. For this reason, Roberto decided to make a living from these businesses, as they are the result of his father's dedication to ensuring that his son would be an honest and hard-working person

Roberto needs the loan he is asking for in order to continue with the business of buying and selling cattle, as this is one of the ways he obtains financial income to maintain his family, for their household expenses. He doesn't want his work to become stalled because he doesn't have enough resources.

His work with the cattle is one of the things that Roberto is most passionate about. This is why he dreams about having dairy cows; in this way he will be able to get fully involved in raising cattle. He wants to strive and to work a lot, as he recognizes that this is a business that requires a lot of investment. With the results of his work he also wants to give his family the best.

loans.use: to invest in the business of buying and selling cattle.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: El joven Luis Miguel, labora como policía municipal en la alcaldía de su municipio, ahora cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien ya trabaja como conserje, uniendo sus esfuerzos podrán ayudar más a sus hijos con sus estudios y mejorar las condiciones de su hogar. Luis Miguel solicita este crédito para comprar materiales de construcción y poder realizarle un anexo a su vivienda ya que esta es muy pequeña y requiere de más espacio para la comodidad familiar.
texts.en:
Luis Miguel works as a municipal police officer at the town hall in his municipality. He now has the support of his wife, who works as a caretaker. Uniting their efforts, they will be able to help their children more with their studies and improve the conditions of their home. 

Luis Miguel is asking for this loan to buy construction materials to be able to put an addition on his home, as it is very small and requires more space for his family's comfort.

loans.use: to buy stones from a quarry, bags of cement, iron and tie wire, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Nabi

texts.ru:
Наби позитивный и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 53 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребёнка. Он живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Но дом, в котором они живут, маловат и не совсем  благоустроен для хорошего проживания в нём. Жена Наби домохозяйка, она очень трудолюбивая и заботливая мама. Сам Наби  работает не покладая рук, он занимается земледелием,  а также работает на тракторе. Но дохода, который зарабатывает Наби хватает только на  проживание. 

Но у него есть мечта, Наби хочет отремонтировать свой дом, в котором они живут. После холодной зимы и обильных дождей и снега, крыша в его доме совсем исхудала, и некоторые части дома также пришли в негодное состояние. Поэтому Наби хочет сделать хороший ремонт своего дома, чтобы жить там было удобно. Но для этого ему необходимы денежные средства. То, что он зарабатывает не достаточно, чтобы позволить себе ремонт дома. Поэтому Наби обратился в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Наби очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en:
Nabi is an optimistic and responsible 53-year old man. He is married and has one child. He lives with his family in a small village. However, the house they live in is rather small and not in a good enough shape. Nabi's wife is a homemaker; she is a very hard-working and caring mother. Nabi works tirelessly: he grows produce and also operates a tractor. Still, the income Nabi earns is enough only for day-to-day expenses.
Nabi has a dream to renovate the house his family lives in. After a cold winter and heavy rain and snow, the roof in the house is worn and other parts of the house are also damaged. Therefore Nabi would like to do renovations to be able to have some comfort. To do this he needs funds. His earnings do not allow him to pay for the renovation. This is why Nabi has applied to Arvand for a loan to buy construction materials and renovate his house. Nabi really hopes for a positive outcome and thanks Arvand for its support in advance

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is a 43-year-old married woman. She has 2 children ages 12 years and 17 years. She describes herself to be industrious. She operates a farm where she grows vegetables for sell. She has been involved in this business for 23 years. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are green grocery owners. She describes her biggest business challenge to be drastic weather changes. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and other farm inputs. She hopes that in the future, she will sustain her family with the business. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizer and other farm inputs

loans.name: Muhannad

texts.en: Muhannad is 26 years old. He lives in a rented house in a sector of Jordan called Irbid with his five siblings and his parents. Muhannad is a university student majoring in cooling and heating systems. He is in his second year and, at the same time, he is working at a restaurant. He is planning to find a better job after his graduation to earn a better income to support his family. Now he is seeking a loan to pay for his upcoming semester fees, as he doesn't have enough money to do so.

loans.use: To pay for his semester fees

loans.name: Hadeel

texts.en: Because Hadeel is a conservative woman, she asked her brother to take her place in the picture. Hadeel is 22 years old. She lives in a sector of Jordan called Baqaa with her 3 siblings and her mother. Her father is deceased. Hadeel is a university student majoring in Computer Information Systems. She is in her 3rd year. She is planning to find a better job after her graduation and to earn better income in order to support her family. She is now seeking a loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees as she doesn't have enough money to do so.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Morena Stella

texts.es:
Morena de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta 6º grado, ella es madre soltera la cual convive solo con sus dos hijas, las cuales están estudiando 3ºy 4º grado por lo que la señora Morena es  la responsable de su familia.

Ella  se dedica ala venta de golosinas y platos típicos, como: pastelillos, enchiladas, empanadas y otros mas,cuya experiencia es de 5 años ,dado aque el padre de sus hijas la dejo y ella tuvo que dedicarse a esta actividad la cual realiza en su casa y los fines de semana se traslada hasta un palenque del cantón a vender sus platos típicos dicha actividad la realiza junto a sus pequeñas hijas .


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar plátano, yuca, maíz arroz aceite y  otros ingredientes. Pues comprando esto podrá surtir su negocio y hacer mas ventas y obtener mas ingresos para su familia.


Los sueños y proyecciones de  Morena son, preparar académicamente a sus hijas  y hacer crecer su negocio ,poder mejorar su vivienda  y que Dios le de salud para seguir trabajando para que esto sueños se le haga realidad y gracias a los créditos espera lograrlos.
texts.en:
Morena is 33 years old and studied up to the sixth grade. She is a single mother who lives with just her two daughters, who are studying and in the third and fourth grades. Morena is therefore the one who is responsible for her family.

She makes a living by selling candies and typical dishes such as savory pastries, enchiladas, empanadas and other items. She has five years of experience, since the father of her daughters left her and she had to make a living from this business, which she carries out at home. On the weekends, she goes to another area of her canton to sell her typical dishes. She does this together with her small daughters.

The loan she is requesting is to buy plantain, cassava, corn, rice, oil and other ingredients. By buying this she will be able to stock her business, make more sales and obtain more earnings for her family.

Morena's dreams and projections are to prepare her daughters academically, to grow her business, to be able to improve her home, and that God gives her the health to keep working so that these dreams will come true. Thanks to the loans, she hopes to achieve these dreams.

loans.use: to buy plantain, cassava, corn, rice, oil and other ingredients.

loans.name: Sophan

texts.en:
Originally from a village in the Ponhea Krek district where farming is a common way to make a living, Sophan is a 43-year-old mother of four children. Growing cassava is the main source of her family’s income, which she and her husband have been doing for 23 years. Her husband supplements their income by working as a policeman. 

This is Sophan’s microloan with VisionFund and she is a third-cycle client. She is now seeking a loan to pay for land fees for growing cassava. She hopes to grow her cassava on time.

loans.use: to pay for land fees for growing cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Bendiya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe BENDIYA est composé de femmes mariées elles ont en moyenne 39 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de MADOUDIARRABOUGOU, commune de KERELA, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de condiment, de céréale, de l’habillement, de chaussure, et de fruits et légumes. Les femmes du groupe BENDIYA sont à leurs troisièmes prêts solidaires. Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à SORO YIRIWASO. Ces montants seront utilisés pour acheter leurs marchandises déjà citées.
La cliente MARIAM  la deuxième personne à partir de la droite dans le rang assis n’est pas instruite. Elle est actuellement vendeuse de condiment depuis 10 ans, chose qu’elle a hérité de sa mère Elle compte acheter 20 kg de poissons fumé, 2 sacs d’oignon, 5 sacs de feuilles d’oignon séché, 10kg de sel, 2 sacs de feuilles de baobab et 5 paquets de cube Maggi  chez les grossistes au marché hebdomadaire de Fana. La vente se fait à une clientèle mixte chez elle et en espèce. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 60 000F par mois, qui sera injectés dans l’activité.
texts.en:
The Bendiya group is composed of married women averaging 39 years of age, with three children. They all live in  traditional families in the village of Madoudiarrabougou,   Kerela municipality, Diola prefecture, Koulikoro region (the second administrative region of Mali). They know each other as relatives, neighbors and friends. They sell condiments, cereals, clothing, shoes, fruits and vegetables. The group members are on their third solidarity loan. With the goal of meeting tremendous customer demand, they have turned to Soro Yiriwaso. Their loan will be used to buy the merchandise mentioned above.

Our client Mariam, the second person seated from the right, did not receive an education. She has been working as a vendor of condiments for 10 years, a business she took over from her mother. She plans to use 20 kg [44 lbs] of smoked fish, two bags of onions, five bags of dry onion skins, 10 [22 lbs] kg of salt, two bags of baobab leaves and five packs of Maggi bouillon cubes from wholesalers at the weekly market in Fana. She sells out of her home, for cash, to a mixed clientele. She plans to earn 60,000 West African franc per months, which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia is a 30-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a tailoring shop in which he sews pants, shirts, trousers, and t-shirts. He takes orders for large quantities and sews the garments in a specified period of time.  He has been sewing these garments since 2008 without an overlock (serger) machine. He has been having the garments overlocked by an outside service and has been paying a healthy amount for these services. Now he wants to buy an overlock machine of his own but he does not have the finances to purchase the machine.

Razia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her husband can buy an overlock machine and save some money. Razia is a repeat client and she has shown excellent repayment behavior. Now, she is representing herself as a group leader due to her excellent repayment behavior. She is very thankful to Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for this honorable favor.

loans.use: To buy an overlock (serger) machine

loans.name: Rus

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural area located in the Ponhea Krek district where farming is a common way to earn a living, Rus is 25 years old and widowed. As a widow, she has struggled to feed her two children by growing cassava and working for others for a fee. Having been in the business for five years, the current business earns her approximately US $13 per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Rus is new to VisionFund this cycle and now she is applying for a loan. She wants to buy a plot of farmland in order to expand her business. She hopes to grow rice to earn a better living..

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Gavharby

texts.en: Gavharby was born in 1978. She is married to Safarhuja. Gavharby is raising three children who are 24, 20 and 18 years old. Her mother-in-law also lives with her family. She is a pensioner. Gavharby has been busy selling clothes and toys for more than 16 years. She sells women’s and children’s clothes and toys in her own shop. When she began her business 16 years ago, she did not have her own place to sell and her working capital was small. Little by little, she developed her business. Now, she manages her business successfully. She is going to buy women’s and children’s clothes and toys for the new season. She is asking for a loan of 10,000 Somoni with this aim. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy women’s and children’s clothes and toys for the new season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes

loans.name: Sirush

texts.en:
Sirush is 53 years old and lives in Stepanavan city in the Lori region. She is married and she has a daughter, who is already married and lives with her family. Sirush and her husband are running a farming business and they keep their cattle in a rented barn that is close to the pastures. They have four cows, three calves and five pigs. Sirush’s husband sells their farm meat to local butchers. Sometimes their daughter and son–in-law help them with the farming activities, but everything they do is done properly and with pleasure. 

Sirush asks for a loan of 3.000 US dollars to buy four more calves and animal fodder for her all farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy four more calves and animal fodder

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is 32 years old and married to Hellen. He is the father of two children, aged 10 and 5 years, respectively. He has been farming on his own piece of land and earns a good income. Maize has proved to be doing well in his area due to good climatic conditions. He learned about VisionFund Kenya through a neighbor. 

This will be his second loan of 45,000 KES (Kenyan shillings). He plans to buy farm inputs and hire machinery for preparation of the land. With the profits he hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, he plans to re-invest in the farm and plant more acres of maize.

Nicholas' dream is to buy a bigger piece of land, plant more maize for commercial use, buy his own farm machinery, and educate his children. He is a hardworking man who is focused on his set goals.

loans.use: to hire machinery for land preparation

loans.name: Silas

texts.en: Silas is a 45-year-old married man. He has four children with ages ranging from 12 to 27 years old. He describes himself to be ambitious. He operates a tailoring shop where he makes clothes to sell. He has been involved in this business for 17 years. His business is located in an area with potential and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the lack of funds. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy threads, fabric and other tailoring materials. His business goal is to be financially stable within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will excel. This is his first loan with SMEP-DTM.

loans.use: to buy threads, fabric and other tailoring materials

loans.name: Chamroen

texts.en:
Age 57 years old, Chamroen is a married mother of two children living in a rural village in the Damabe district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. Rice farming, cassava growing, raising pigs and selling groceries are the main sources of her family’s income. Having been in this business for 33 years, she is able to earn about 100,000 KHR per day but she can save about 20,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Chamroen has been with VisonFund for just one cycle and now she is seeking a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Boaz

texts.en:
Boaz is a 52-year-old farmer from a local cell in Kamwenge district. He is married with six children who are all in school. He also looks after his aged mother, who is unable to take care of herself.

Boaz deals in small-scale agriculture, which he supports with an alcohol-brewing business where he earns income to feed his family and pay tuition for his children. He has applied for a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan shillings to help him buy raw materials to increase production. He will use the rest of the money to pay school fees for his children.

Boaz is a very hardworking man. He also hopes to construct a permanent home for his children.

loans.use: To buy raw materials in the form of bananas to make the local brew

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en: Alaa is 23 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with her four siblings and her parents. Alaa is a university student majoring in English literature. She is in her fourth year. She is planning to find a better job after her graduation and to earn a better income in order to support her family financially. But because she is facing financial crisis, she is not able to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en: Khaled is 20 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with his two brothers and his parents. One of his brothers is serving in the military. Khaled is a university student majoring in Media. He is in his third year. He is planning to find a better job after his graduation and to earn a better income to support his family financially. His family is currently facing a financial crisis that is preventing them from paying for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her son’s vocational training tuition fee

loans.name: Chanlim

texts.en:
Chanlim, 31, lives with her husband and two children in a rural village in the Kampong Siem district, Cambodia. To feed the family, Chanlim works as a garment worker while her husband works as a paid worker. They have been in these jobs for 11 years, earning about US $9 per day to spend on the family’s needs. 

Chanlim has been with VisionFund for two cycles and completely paid back her past loans, which have helped her better support her family. 

Now Chanlim is applying for a loan to buy a decent motorbike for her family. She hopes this loan will enable her to have a motorbike to commute.

loans.use: to buy a decent motorbike for her family

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Mahmadaly

texts.en:
Mahmadaly was born in 1989. He is married and has no children. He lives with his family in a rural area. 

Mahmadaly has been busy with his bakery. He cooks and sells flatbreads to local people from his village. He has his own regular customers. Mahmadaly’s workshop is located near the local bazaar--that’s why there are many people who buy his product. 

Mahmadaly is going to increase his working capital. He is asking for a loan of 3,000 USD to buy flour and coal for cooking more flatbread. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy flour and coal for cooking more flatbread

loans.name: Maher

texts.en: Maher is 20 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with his five siblings and his parents. He is a university student majoring in the Samia language. He is in his third year. Maher is planning to find a better job after his graduation and to earn a better income in order to support his family financially, as they are currently facing a financial crisis, which is why they are not helping him to pay his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Shehnaz's Group

texts.en: Shehnaz, age 48, is married and living with her husband and four children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband works at a small firm for low wages. Shehnaz owns a small business selling clothing at home. She purchases clothes from the market at a low price and sells it for a high price in her community. The ladies of town like her garment collection and selection a lot. Her family members appreciate her for her efforts. Now that the winter season is going on, she wants to buy winter clothes to sell. But she does not have enough money due to her household expenses.  She has requested a loan so she can buy winter clothes to cope with the demands of her customers. She wishes for a bright future for her children and her dream is to provide a better education to her children. She is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Titus

texts.en: Titus is a 35-year-old married man. He has 2 children, who are 1 year and 5 years. He describes himself to be goal oriented. He operates a retail business where he sells clothes and other items. His business is located in an area with lots of customers and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes and other items for resale. He hopes that in the future, the business will yield high returns and enable him buy a house. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes and other items for resale.

loans.name: Arkadi

texts.en:
Arkadi is 29 years old and he lives in Vanadzor City in the Lori region. Arkadi sends his thanks to Kiva and its lenders’ team and tells about his great desire for a second loan. He is still in the shoes trading business.  He still works in the Vanadzor wholesale market in a rented stall. The merchandise he brings from Yerevan once in a month. He used to work with his brother who made shoes which Arkadi sold, but now Arkadi works separately and he buys his stall products from local shoemakers also. Arkadi has worked in this field for 10 years and he knows the fashion and the style that sells better in his city.

Arkadi asks for a loan of 1,000,000 AMD in order to buy a new collection of shoes for the coming spring season.  He greatly hopes for Kiva lenders’ support for the second time.

loans.use: to buy a new collection of shoes for the coming spring season.

loans.name: Reham

texts.en: Reham is 22 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Salt with her 5 siblings and her mother. Her father is deceased. Reham is a university student, majoring in Business Administration. She is in her 3rd year. She is planning to find a better job after her graduation and to earn better income in order to support her family financially. But because she is facing financial crisis, she is not able to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is 20 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with his 4 siblings and his parents. He is a university student, majoring in Samia and Eastern Languages. He is in his 2nd year. He is planning to find a better job after his graduation and to earn better income in order to support his family financially as they are currently facing a financial crisis which is not helping them to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is a 44-year old woman, living with her five children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Shamim’s husband has been driving an auto rickshaw and pays a daily fare because this rickshaw does not belong to him. He belongs to an ultra poor family. Now his children are growing older and their needs have grown as well. He has been worried for many days about how to avoid paying the daily fare so he decided to buy his own rickshaw.
 
Shamim has been saving for many days to buy a new auto rickshaw for her husband, but at the time of purchasing she didn't have enough money. Therefore, Shamim has requested a loan for her husband so that her husband can buy a new rickshaw with the contribution of her savings.  Shamim hopes that now her husband does not have any need to pay rent and that he can increase his income. 

Shamim is very happy after taking this loan. She thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw.

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of the Kampong Cham province’s Chhoeng Prey district, Sophal is aged 45 years and married with two children. For the last 20 years, she has been farming rice and working as a paid worker. Together, she and her husband can earn about US $13 per day and can save about US $10 each day for their future needs. 

This is the first loan for Sophal with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is applying for a loan to buy a plot of farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business so as to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Mariame

texts.en: Mariame is a Cameroonian, aged thirty-three and a widow with four children. The oldest of her children is sixteen and is in secondary school, while the youngest is two years old. Mariame has been in this business for over a year now. Her business is likely to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. This loan will be used to increase her turnover by fifty percent.

loans.use: to buy raw food to cook and sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of seasonal fabrics, in order to develop her business.

loans.name: Jorge Alexander

texts.es:
Jorge de 25 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y dedicado a sus labores que realiza a lo largo de su vida sea dedicado a la pesca,  que es de donde tiene ingresos para su familia que esta formada por su hija de a penas 2 años y su esposa que se dedica a los oficios doméstico y a la crianza de aves como gallinas y cerdos para tener un ingreso más para su familia.

La pesca es la actividad mas fuerte que realizan los habitantes de la zona y es de la que obtiene ingresos para su familia, una de las ventajas que tiene es que desde muy pequeño su padre le enseño, las actividades que se necesitan saber para ejercer el trabajo de pesca, en su momento se hizo difícil el trabajo, pero sabía que más adelante seria de donde iba a estar ganando para salir adelante. Fue así que a medida pasaba el tiempo se fue perfeccionando, en esta activad hasta la fecha está muy contento y agradecido con su padre y amigos que gracias a ellos, hoy sabe un trabajo y que su familia a salido a delante. 

A parte de dedicarse a la pesca, también se dedica a servir como guía turístico en la playa,  que eso lo aprendió gracias a una ONG que los capacito para explotar un lugar turístico y es así como también obtiene unos ingresos extras.

El cliente por estar en una zona turística, ha solicitado el crédito para invertir en una pequeña tienda que posee, comprara cosas básicas para bebe, como pampers, gerbert, pachas y otros. Esto por la zona y conocen que la mayoría de turistas preguntan por esos productos. Además,  invertirá en cosas de primera necesidad como frijoles, arroz, azúcar, aceite y más.

Uno de sus sueños es poder tener su propia casa y que el terreno sea propio para que en un futuro sus hija tenga donde vivir. También, piensa en tener una tienda bien surtida donde pueda disponer de todo.
texts.en:
Jorge, 25, is a hardworking person who is dedicated to the work he does.  Throughout his life he has been a fisherman, which is the source of his income for his family.  He has a daughter who is just two years old, and his wife takes care of the household and raises pigs and birds such as chickens as another source of income for the family.

Fishing is the main profession practiced by people in the area and this is how Jorge earns income for his family.  One of the advantages he has is that his father taught him the skills he needed to know to work in fishing starting when he was very young.  At one time the work was difficult, but he knew that later it would allow him to make money to get ahead in life, so over time he perfected his abilities and now he is very happy and thankful to his father and friends because thanks to them he now knows a trade and his family has gotten ahead.

Besides working in fishing, Jorge also serves as a tour guide on the beach.  He learned to do this thanks to an NGO which trained them to take advantage of a tourist destination, and in this way he also earns some extra income.

Being in a tourist zone, Jorge has requested a loan to invest in a small shop he has.  He will buy basic baby needs such as diapers, baby food, bottles, etc.  In this area they know that most tourists ask for these products.  Also, he will buy basic necessities like beans, rice, sugar, oil, etc.

One of his dreams is to be able to have his own house and own the land so that one day his daughter can have a place to live.  He also wants to have a well stocked store where he could have everything available.

loans.use: to buy diapers, baby food, bottles, beans, rice, sugar, oil, and other products to sell

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Сайёра 29-летняя сельская женщина родом из района Гиссар. Она живет там с мужем, двумя детьми и родителями. Сайёра со своей семьей занимается растениеводством. У них имеется орошаемый участок земли. Они уже обработали почву для посева. Сайёра просит кредит для купли семян пшеницы и минеральных удобрений. Она хочет ранней весной посеять пшеницу и летом получить качественный урожай. За счет прибыли с продажи Сайёра хочет улучшить жилищные условия.
texts.en: Sayora is a 29-year-old woman who comes from a rural area of the Gissar district.  She lives with her husband, her two children and her parents.  Her family is involved in agriculture.  They own an irrigated plot of land and have already prepared their soil for planting.  Sayora is taking a loan to buy wheat seeds and mineral fertilizers.  She wants to sow some wheat in the early spring in order to get a good harvest in the summer.  With the earnings from her loan, she will improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy wheat seeds and mineral fertilizers for early spring sowing.

loans.name: Blanca Isabel

texts.es:
Blanca de 55 años de edad, estudio hasta 3  grado de educación, está casada desde hace 23 años su pareja se dedica a la agricultura.


La cliente tiene como negocio una venta de lácteos, leche y queso. Se ha dedicado a esta labor por 13 años esta labor la aprendió sola es una forma de aportar  a su familia y ayudar a su esposo en la economía. Es el único negocio que posee, va a vender sus productos hasta la capital y recorre 43 kilómetros en bus. En el negocio algunas veces también le ayuda la hija de la cliente,  el horario de trabajo es de 7 horas al día.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar una vaquilla lechera. Esto ayudara a mejorar el negocio porque le producirán más producto lácteo  y tendrá la oportunidad de comercializar más y tener mejores ingresos. Teniendo mejores ingresos podrá satisfacer las necesidades de su familia 


Sus sueños para el futuro, son instalar  un puesto de venta estable; ya que actualmente no lo tiene, para sus hijos le gustaría que sigan estudiando ya que ellos debido a falta de dinero ya no pueden seguir.
texts.en:
55-year-old Blanca studied up until the third grade. She has been married for 23 years. Her partner makes a living from agriculture.

The client’s business is selling dairy products, milk, and cheese. She has been doing this for thirteen years and learnt how to do it by herself. It is a way of contributing to the family and helping her husband financially. It is the only business she has. She travels 43 kilometres by bus to the capital to sell her products. Sometimes her daughter helps her with the business. Blanca works seven hours a day. 

The loan she is requesting from CrediCampo is for purchasing a dairy calf. This will help her to improve the business, because it will help them produce more dairy products and give them the opportunity of selling more and having more earnings. Having greater earnings will enable them to meet the family’s needs.

Her dreams for the future are to set up a permanent sales stall, since she does not have one at the moment, and see her children continue studying, since at the moment they cannot continue due to the lack of money.

loans.use: to buy a dairy calf

loans.name: Leopoldo Misael

texts.es:
Leopoldo tiene 31 años de edad, está acompañado, tiene 4 hijos y solamente estudió hasta educación media. 

Leopoldo, se dedica al trabajo en la agricultura, su esposa le ayuda en esta actividad,  el oficio lo aprendió gracias a sus padres quienes se lo enseñaron desde muy pequeño, para llegar a la parcelas donde cultiva se levanta a las 4:30 AM y además sus hijos le ayudan en el trabajo, tiene que caminar 2  Km y trabaja durante la mañana.

El crédito que él está solicitando, lo invertirá para comprar una vaca que necesita para incrementar la producción de leche para la venta y obtener ingresos adicionales para la manutención de su familia.
texts.en:
Leopoldo is 31 years old with a partner and four children, and he only studied up until intermediate. 

Leopoldo makes a living by working in agriculture. His wife helps him with his work. He learnt the job from his parents when he was very young. In order to get to the parcels of land where he grows his crops, he gets up at 4:30am. His children also help him with his work. They have to walk two kilometres and work all through the morning.

He will invest the loan he is requesting in purchasing a cow, which he needs in order to increase his milk production so he can sell more and obtain additional income for the provision of his family.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Kahindi

texts.en:
Kahindi is a 57-year-old retail shop proprietor in Mariakani, Kenya. He is a married father of seven, and his wife is a housewife. He has been in this business for the last four years and he is doing well.

This marks his first borrowing from VisionFund Kenya to finance his business. He will use the loan to purchase stock of sugar, wheat and maize flour, tea leaves and cooking fat, and the anticipated profit to expand his business and service his loan. He hopes to have a financially stable family in future.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, wheat and maize flour, tea leaves and cooking fat

loans.name: Poch

texts.en:
Poch, aged 38, is a married father living in a rural village in Dambae district, Kampong Cham province. He has four children. He is a hard-working farmer who grows rice and cassava and sometimes works for others for a fee. With hard work, he can earn about 37,000KHR per day and save about 23,000KHR each day for future needs.

Poch has been with VisionFund for six cycles and has completely paid back the past loans, which have helped him better support his family. Now he is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his farmland. He hopes this loan will enable him to earn more income from his current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his farmland.

loans.name: Kishwar

texts.en:
Kishwar is 51 years old woman, and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of three children and her husband is a contractor by profession. He is a guardian of his family and manages the entire household. Kishwar has been running her own beauty salon for one year, and contributes her income to fulfill her family's needs.

Kishwar needs different types of cosmetics and other items for her business, but due to insufficient financial means she is unable to purchase these items, so she has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan she can purchase these items to fulfill her business needs, and earn more profitable income by providing better services.

Kishwar is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy different types of cosmetics and other items for her business.

loans.name: Siddika

texts.en:
Siddika is a kind woman. She is married and has adult children. 

She has a higher degree and has been a director of a school for more than seven years. She likes her job. Siddika earns additional income from animal husbandry - feeding cows. Little by little, Siddika has developed her business. She manages her business alone. 

Siddika is asking for a loan of 7,500 Somoni to buy cows. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Uzma's Group

texts.en:
Uzma is a 31-year old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband makes iron chains by hand in his workshop. The chain is made on a hearth by hammering cut lengths of red-hot wrought iron rod into oval links, one link passing through the next to form a cable. A few days ago, the iron rod's coil was stole from his workshop, and now he is unable to make any chains to sell to earn a living.

Uzma has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband will be able to buy a new iron rod's coil and start his business again.

Uzma is a mother of three children and it is very difficult to feed all of them in a day. Her dreams are to provide all the necessities to each of her children. She is very thankful to BRAC Pakistan for this honorable favor.

loans.use: to buy a new iron rod's coil for her husband's business making iron chains.

loans.name: Qusai

texts.en:
Qusai is twenty-three years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with his three siblings and his parents. He is a third year university student majoring in Sports Training. At the same time as studying, he also works at a coffee shop. 

Qusai is planning to find a better job after graduation and to earn a better income, so he can support his family financially. They are currently facing a financial crisis, which means that they cannot pay for his upcoming semester's fees at university. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester's university fees

loans.name: Edson

texts.en:
Edson comes from Kyotamusana, Kamwenge district. He is 40 years old and is married with eight children who are all in school. He is trustworthy and hardworking.

Edson grows coffee beans, from which he earns a living to look after his family members. He has applied for a loan of UGX.2,000,000 to buy manure and pesticides to prevent pests and diseases which attack his coffee beans. He aims to increase his production to 500 bags of coffee per season. He wants to use the rest of the money to pay school fees for his children.

He is faced with a challenge of having a poor means of transport to take coffee to the market, so he hopes to buy a motocycle to assist transporting his coffee to the market.

loans.use: to buy organic manure for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Thai

texts.en:
Thai is a local villager from Kampong Cham province. She a 44 year-old mother of five children. Currently, only three of her children are still under her responsibility, and two of them are in school. 

The main source of her family’s income is from her cashew trading business, buying other’s yields for resale. To supplement her income, she works for others for a fee. 

This Thai's second microloan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loan, which she has successfully repaid, has enabled her to support her family and keep her kids in school. For this cycle, she is getting a new loan to buy cassava for resale when the price is. She hopes that she can gain a good income from her occupation, so she can keep her kids in school.

loans.use: to buy cassava for resale.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Yasmin Auxiliadora

texts.es: Yasmin es originaria de la ciudad de Granada, casada y madre de dos hijos. Tiene 29 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Inicio su negocio con dinero propio y poco a poco fue creciendo, logrando así ofertar más productos a sus clientes. Su meta próxima es ampliar su negocio y estudiar la carrera de modista profesional. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Arroz, Azúcar, Aceite y útiles escolares. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá ofrecer una amplia variedad de productos a sus clientes. Su plan futuro mejorar la infraestructura de su casa y ofrecerle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Yasmin is from the city of Granada. She is married and mother of 2 children. She is 29 years old.

She works as a merchant and has a convenience store. She started her business with her own money and, bit by bit, her business grew and she could offer more products to her customers. Her next goal is to expand her store and to study the career of a professional fashion designer. 

She asks for a loan to buy: rice, sugar, oil, and school supplies. She thinks that the loan will help her a lot as she will be able to offer her customers a wide variety of products.

Her plan for the future is to make improvements to her house and to offer her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy: rice, sugar, oil, and school supplies.

loans.name: Khim's Angkor Community Group

texts.en: Khim (left) is a twenty-five year old single mother with a four-year old little girl. She supports her mother who requires constant medical care, her younger sister, her younger brother and a niece. The family shares a small traditional house made of straw that neighbors have been kind enough to let them use. Khim works out of a small stall with basic groceries (vegetables, eggs, milk, condiments etc) to provide for her family’s subsistence. Khim is well liked in the village because of her good nature and kind manners. The loan will help her stock up on groceries and increase her sales. With the profits she will be able to provide for the needs of her family. The other members of the group are Aing Heng, Van Noeun, Samai, and Seakleng. They have decided to apply for loans to purchase a greater variety of second hand clothes as well as to stock up on coconuts for their respective village stalls.

loans.use: To stock up on snacks, candies, condiments and to buy ingredients for making rice porridge for sale.

loans.name: Sophon's Angkor Community Group

texts.en: Sophon (center) is a thirty-nine year old seamstress, mother of three. With her younger brother Hak, she operates a sewing and laundry workshop. Sophon is a talented tailor, she cuts and sews shirts, trousers, skirts and made to measure clothes. During the wedding season, she is busy with bridal attires as well. The workshop is located in a small rural wet market that caters to local villagers. The loan will help her purchase supplies for her workshop and will allow her to make additional clothes on order. Sophon and her friend Samphos hope to be able to offer a broader variety of apparels with more choices for textiles, buttons, laces etc. Hak will fix some of his older washing machines and buy laundry detergent with the loan.

loans.use: To purchase sewing supplies such as textiles, needles, thread spools, machine spare parts and laundry detergent.

loans.name: Sopher's Angkor Community Group

texts.en: Sopher (left) is a forty-five year old single mother with two young children. She’s originally from Cambodia’s coastal area, far to the south, but has recently moved to Siem Reap in the hope of making a better living. As a new migrant, she was happy to be welcomed by the other members of the group, who are also engaged in small trade. With her savings she was able to purchase a small cart where she sells coffee (for grownups) and shaved ice (for children). She currently uses a small ice planer to make slushies, which is quite tiring and slow to operate. With the loan, Sopher will be able to purchase a rotating manual shaver with adjustable blades (produced by a local workshop). With the increased benefits, she will feel more secure about her ability to make a living and provide for her children. Sopher’s group is composed entirely of working mothers. Cham Roeun, Sokunthea, Nara and Nareth will use the loans to stock up on groceries for their small stalls, purchase spare parts for their tuk-tuk delivery services, and tools for their motorbike workshop.

loans.use: To purchase an ice shaver and ingredients for ice and coffee stall (ice, coffee, sugar, beans, syrup).

loans.name: Katunge

texts.en:
Katunge is a thirty-four-year-old beauty shop proprietor in Mariakani, Kenya. She is also a married mother of three children. She has been in this business for the last six years and her husband gives her additional support.

This is Katunge's first loan from VisionFund Kenya to finance her business. She will use the loan to purchase beauty soap, human hair, hair lotion and shampoo for resale. 

She plans to use the anticipated profit to restock her shop. In future, she hopes to own several outlets for the same business.

loans.use: to purchase beauty soap, human hair, hair lotion and shampoo

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a fifty-five-year-old married woman. She has four children with ages ranging from thirty to thirty-six. She describes herself to be humble and ambitious. 

Mary operates a farm where she grows coffee, bananas, vegetables and other crops to sell. She also keeps dairy cows which produce milk for selling. She has been involved in this business for thirty years. Her business is located in a good place with enough rainfall and her primary customers are the general public. She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of funds. 

She will use this KES 20,000 loan to buy seeds and animal feed. Her business goal is to be able to sell at least 50 litres of milk a day within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will give the best to her family. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan of KES 10,000 was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to buy another cow.

loans.use: buy seeds and animal feed

loans.name: Aseel

texts.en: Aseel is twenty-one years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with her sister and mother. Her father is deceased and her brother is serving in the military. Aseel is a third-year university student majoring in Computer Science. She is planning to find a better job after her graduation and to earn better income in order to support her family financially. Currently, she is not able to pay for her upcoming semester's university fees because she is facing financial difficulties. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester's university fees

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 48 años de edad, nunca tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a la esucela pues sus padres desde muy pequeño lo mandaron a trabajar, vive con su esposa y una nieta, ya que sus hijos son adultos y sosn indpendientes.

Él tiene 15 años de experiencia en el manejo de ganado de engorde en repasto, también trabaja como pescador artesanal, ya que vive cerca de una bahía de manglares, con la venta de la pesca, logra mantener a su familia, fue la necesidad de salir adelante la que llevó a Pedro a aprender estos trabajos, pues no encuentra un empleo formal debido a que no pudo estudiar.

Pedro necesita este préstamo de CREDICAMPO, para comprar 2 novillos de engorde en repasto, con esto podrá asegurar un mejor ingreso después de cierto tiempo, ya que venderá sus animales para pagar el crédito, y ádemás le quedar ganancia para la alimentación de sus familia.

El señor planea para un futuro, ahorrar y trabajar con esfuerzo, para construir su casita, ya que en la que vive no es vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Pedro is 48 years old. He never had the opportunity to attend school, due to his parents sending him to work at a young age. He lives with his wife and a granddaughter. since his children are independent adults.

He has 15 years' experience in cattle handling and works as an artisan fisherman, because he lives close to a mangrove bay. He manages to provide for his family through the sale of fish. Pedro learnt how to do these jobs out of necessity to pull through, since he cannot find a formal job because he was unable to study.

Pedro needs this CREDICAMPO loan to buy two calves for fattening. With this, he will be able to ensure a better income after a certain period, since he will sell the animals. He will use the money to pay back the loan and to feed his family. 

Pedro plans to save and work hard for the future. He wants to build a house, because the one he lives in is not his own.

loans.use: to buy two calves for fattening

loans.name: Saba

texts.en:
Saba is twenty-two years old. She lives in a rented house in sector in Jordan called Salt with her two siblings and her parents. She is a university student majoring in Plants Engineering. 

Saba is planning to find a better job after graduation so that she can earn a better income and support her family financially. Currently, she is facing a financial crisis and not able to pay for her upcoming semester's university fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester's university fees

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is a man of thirty-two years, married to Catherine and father of one child. He works in dairy farming and motorcycle transport in Nderi, which is in the outskirts of Kangemi. He has been in business for nine years and earns a monthly income of thirty thousand.

This will be Nicholas' third loan with VisionFund Kenya. He plans to use the entire loan to buy a dairy cow. In future, he wants to educate his children and open a different business.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Muneeran

texts.en:
Muneeran’s husband is a kind and hard-working person. He has grown old now and does not have as much working capacity as when he was young. He still tries to satisfy his family's needs, so he continues working as a carpenter in his old age. Muneeran does not work; she stays at home and most days she suffers from illness. 

Muneeran's husband works in his own business in order to have a regular income for the family. He started this business over thirty-five years ago. The business is involved in manufacturing and selling wooden four-wheeled carts. The business yields a good income but the family's needs are increasing day by day and they need to earn more money. Now her husband wants to buy more raw materials for making four-wheeled carts in order to expand his business. This is why Muneeran came to BRAC Pakistan. She wishes to obtain a loan to buy wooden planks, wheels and tyres for making four-wheel manual carts.

Muneeran hopes that this loan will prove beneficial and productive for the business as well as for their family.She thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for this honorable support.

loans.use: To buy wooden planks, wheels and tyres for making four-wheeled manual carts.

loans.name: Sheqo

texts.en:
Sheqo, who has been photographed here with one of her grandsons, wants to buy a dairy cow. She currently plants and sells beans, potatoes and natural flowers and also has some cherry orchards.

Sheqo is married and has three children. She lives in a rural area that has a cold climate. The soil in her area is good and supports vegetable growth, such as potatoes, tomatoes, onions, wheat and corn.

A bit about her village: The traditional foods of her village are “lakror,” which is like a pie made of two pieces of thick filo pastry stuffed with wild greens, dairy products or a mix of onions and tomatoes, and "petanik," which is made of dried thin filo pastry stuffed with cooked beans. As for traditional costumes, the most common are the white fez and felt.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Seren

texts.en:
Seren, aged 33 years old, is a resident from the Prasat Bakong district in Siem Reap province. She is married and has three unmarried children who are living with her and her husband. Her family relies on income from her farming business and her husband’s construction work. She learned to cultivate rice from her parents and has been doing this for more than 15 years. Giving all of her effort to the business allows her to provide enough food for her children and send them to be educated at school.

In order to help her further develop her farming business, Seren is requesting a loan to buy a plowing machine for maintenance of the rice field. With this loan, she will be able to improve the productivity of her farm, thus increasing her yield and income.

loans.use: to buy a plowing machine for maintenance of the rice field.

loans.name: Soeurn

texts.en:
Soeurn is a 45-year-old married woman who has been blessed with three school-going children. She helps her husband earn income by farming rice and has been doing so for nearly 20 years. With the support from her husband and children, she earns approximately KHR 12,000 per day as estimated by a credit agent.

Soeurn now wants to create another business opportunity and experience a better profit for her family. That’s why she is applying for additional capital to buy stock of rice for future sales. She hopes that, through the loan help, she can improve her income as well as her general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice for future sales.

loans.name: Than

texts.en:
Than, aged 38, is a farmer from a remote area of Baray district in Kampong Thom province. She is single and lives with her mother and other siblings. She has been in the farming business for more than 20 years and she is also engaged in selling fish for additional income. From her current businesses she is able to earn KHR50,000 per day to support her family’s financial needs.

As of now she is asking for a loan to buy a plot of land for farming. With this loan she will be able to improve the productivity of her farm and increase her yield and profit. In the future she hopes to save enough for future development of her business and emergencies of her family.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for farming

loans.name: Chinda

texts.en:
Chinda is 29 years of age and a hardworking farmer from a peaceful village in Kampong Cham province. She is married and is responsible for raising three children who are living depending on her income. Chinda has managed one and a half hectare of farmland, which is located not too far from her home, for growing rice. Having been in this type of business for over ten years, she has gained valuable experience to improve her farming practices and is able to earn KHR 20,000 per day now.

Chinda is asking for this loan which will be used to buy farming inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides. She hopes Kiva lenders will not reject her loan and is very thankful for their support. In the future, she is aiming to develop her farming business and improve her home to ensure better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to buy farming inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides.

loans.name: Phonn

texts.en:
Phonn, age 49, is engaged in the farming business which serves as his family's main source of income. He is married with five children, four of whom are still living under his care. Phonn is very passionate about supporting his family through farming activities. Having been in this occupation for years, he is able to make a proper income of about USD5.00 per day.

He would like to apply for a new loan which he will utilize to build a grocery store for selling different kinds of products in his community. His wife will be responsible for this business. He looks forward to this financial help which allows him to further improve his living conditions and financial stability.

loans.use: to build a grocery store for selling different kinds of products in his community.

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en:
Vanna is a woman of 35 years. She lives with her spouse and two dependent children in Ta Ngal, a remote area of Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. Farming is the major source of her income, which she uses for daily meals and school allowances for her children. Having been in the farming business for nearly 20 years, she is able to earn a proper income of KHR 12,000 per day and her husband makes around KHR 20,000 per day from construction work. The hardship Vanna and her husband face is the lack of a vehicle for commuting, so they have to pay for a daily taxi service to get to work or anywhere they want.

This is her seventh loan with Hattha Kaksekar Limited, and she wants to use her amount to buy a motorcycle to fulfill their transportation needs. With this purchase, they will be able to save more money for any future emergency needs of their family.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to fulfill their transportation needs.

loans.name: Sreang

texts.en:
Sreang, aged 36, is married and a father responsible for four children. Sreang lives with his family in a rural village of Baray district, Kampong Thom province. He makes a living by farming rice and climbing palm trees for juice. His wife helps him generate income by raising pigs at their home.
